Author: gigi-has-issues
Text: The Heartbreak Diet is one I know well.  Break ups are, in my humble experience, some of the hardest things a person can go through. You can always PM me. Just know that it DOES get easier and research shows that most people feel much better in a month than they anticipate they will.  And when you meet the next guy, you'll be glad you went through this and were single.

Author: strangerrrdangerrr
Text: despair is the most effective diet imo. take some wine into a bubble bath and be safe bb ❤️
